      • setPanTiltZoomRelative

        com.icontrol.openhome.data.ResponseStatus setPanTiltZoomRelative(java.lang.String channelId,
                                                               java.lang.String pan,
                                                               java.lang.String tilt,
                                                               java.lang.String zoom)
                                                                 throws CameraException
        Pans, tilts, and/or zooms the device relative to the current position.
        Parameters:
        channelId - - PTZ channel Id.
        pan - - pan the camera left (negative) or right (positive) the number of specified degrees.
        tilt - - tilt the camera down (negative) or up (positive) the number of specified degrees.
        zoom - - adjust the zoom in (positive) or out (negative) the specified percentage (-100 through 100).
        Returns:
        ResponseStatus
        Throws:
        CameraException

      • setPanTiltZoomAbsolute

        com.icontrol.openhome.data.ResponseStatus setPanTiltZoomAbsolute(java.lang.String channelId,
                                                               java.lang.String pan,
                                                               java.lang.String tilt,
                                                               java.lang.String zoom)
                                                                 throws CameraException
        Pans, tilts, and/or zooms the device to the absolute position specified.
        Parameters:
        channelId - - PTZ channel Id.
        pan - - pan the camera left or right to the absolute azimuth specified (0 through 360).
        tilt - - tilt the camera up or down to the absolute elevation specified (-90 through 90).
        zoom - - adjust the zoom to the absolute percentage specified (0-100).
        Returns:
        Throws:
        CameraException
